name: Zesty Marinated Asparagus
author: KNITMAMA
summary: Tender asparagus is marinated in a balsamic vinaigrette and sprinkled with tangy lemon zest and fresh parsley. This is a quick and easy side dish.
ingredients: 2 pounds fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2 1/2 inch pieces
1 ½ cups balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing
½ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil
Blanch asparagus just until tender, about 1 minute
Plunge into a bowl of cold water to cool
Drain asparagus and place in a large resealable plastic bag
Pour in vinaigrette and seal bag
Refrigerate at least 3 hours, turning bag occasionally
Just before serving, drain asparagus, reserving vinaigrette
Arrange on a serving platter and sprinkle with lemon zest, parsley, salt, and pepper
Serve reserved vinaigrette in a small dish on the side
